includedAssets.title: Day 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A murder looks solved, but the chief of investigation calls in Sarah Lund, fearing all is not as it seems. Series two of the Danish drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A murder looks solved, but the chief of investigation calls in Sarah Lund, fearing all is not as it seems. Series two of the Danish drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A murder looks solved, but the chief of investigation calls in Sarah Lund, fearing all is not as it seems. Series two of the Danish drama.

includedAssets.title: Day 2
includedAssets.synopsis: A second victim with a military background is discovered, while suspected terrorist involvement creates political issues.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A second victim with a military background is discovered, while suspected terrorist involvement creates political issues.

includedAssets.title: Day 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Intelligence services push for the investigation to focus on terrorism, but Lund follows a different line of enquiry.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Intelligence services push for the investigation to focus on terrorism, but Lund follows a different line of enquiry.

includedAssets.title: Day 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Another victim prompts Lund to look closer at the army squad's time in Afghanistan. Buch tries not to give in to political pressure.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buch pays a visit to his predecessor, while Lund puts a controversial theory to the test.

includedAssets.synopsis: Lund thinks she has found the murderer, while Raben continues his rogue investigation and Buch confronts a colleague.

includedAssets.title: Day 10
includedAssets.synopsis: Secrets are revealed in the military and the government. Thrilling finale to the hit Danish crime drama's second season.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Despite being demoted following the Larsen case, Sarah Lund’s former boss recruits her to help solve the murder of a military legal advisor. Meanwhile, the newly appointed Minister of Justice suspects his predecessor covered up a massacre in Afghanistan which is linked to the murder. Season two of the Scandi noir thriller starring Sofie Gråbøl, Mikael Birkkjær and Nicolas Bro.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Despite being demoted, Sarah Lund is asked to solve the murder of a military legal advisor. Season two of the Scandi noir drama starring Sofie Gråbøl.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Despite being demoted following the Larsen case, Sarah Lund’s former boss recruits her to help solve the murder of a military legal advisor. Meanwhile, the newly appointed Minister of Justice suspects his predecessor covered up a massacre in Afghanistan which is linked to the murder. Season two of the Scandi noir thriller starring Sofie Gråbøl, Mikael Birkkjær and Nicolas Bro.

includedIn.title: The Killing
includedIn.synopsis: Danish Detective Inspector Sarah Lund battles to solve gruesome, complex investigations in the face of her crumbling personal life, hostile colleagues and a suspect political class.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Danish Detective Sarah Lund battles to find the truth in the face of her crumbling personal life, hostile colleagues and a suspect political class.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Danish Detective Inspector Sarah Lund battles to solve gruesome, complex investigations in the face of her crumbling personal life, hostile colleagues and a suspect political class.

title: The Killing Season 2
synopsis: Despite being demoted following the Larsen case, Sarah Lund’s former boss recruits her to help solve the murder of a military legal advisor. Meanwhile, the newly appointed Minister of Justice suspects his predecessor covered up a massacre in Afghanistan which is linked to the murder. Season two of the Scandi noir thriller starring Sofie Gråbøl, Mikael Birkkjær and Nicolas Bro. Danish with subtitles.
shortSynopsis: Despite her demotion, Sarah Lund investigates the murder of a military legal advisor. Scandi noir drama starring Sofie Gråbøl. Danish with subtitles.
mediumSynopsis: Despite being demoted following the Larsen case, Sarah Lund’s former boss recruits her to help solve the murder of a military legal advisor. Meanwhile, the newly appointed Minister of Justice suspects his predecessor covered up a massacre in Afghanistan which is linked to the murder. Season two of the Scandi noir thriller starring Sofie Gråbøl, Mikael Birkkjær and Nicolas Bro. Danish with subtitles.
